alert.note: Alert for De Soto; Sabine (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 02 at 3:45PM CST until January 02 at 9:00PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Louisiana and northeast Texas, including the following counties and parishes, in northwest Louisiana, De Soto and Sabine. In northeast Texas, Angelina, Sabine, San Augustine and Shelby. * WHEN...Until 645 PM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 345 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Milam, San Augustine, Converse, Rosevine, Patroon, Macune, Huxley, Noble, Sexton, Bronson, Chinaquapin, Jordans Store and Toledo Bend Reservoir North. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
